ModMetaData.name: Patty's Backstories
ModMetaData.author: IAmPattyJack
ModMetaData.description:
A collection of over 100 new child and adult backstories to enhance your RimWorld experience.
All backstories are compatible with vanilla RimWorld 1.5.
Identified issues with other mods: None
If you find any issues with errors or typos in the mod, please reach out to me and name the exact backstory you are having the issue with along with a description of the problem.
Enjoy the mod? Please rate it and consider supporting me at https://buymeacoffee.com/iampattyjack
Have fun!
Version 1.0
